duties_responsibilities.duty: Craft compelling and creative copy for various marketing materials and channels.
Collaborate with art directors and designers to bring creative ideas to life.
Work on copy for television, digital, social, radio, print, and other marketing communication channels.
Stay updated with cultural and industry trends to infuse them into the copywriting.
Manage multiple work-streams and adhere to critical project timelines in a fast-paced environment.
Maintain a positive, can-do attitude in the work environment.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in advertising, communications, or related field. Certificate in copywriting from an advertising/creative portfolio school is a bonus but not mandatory.
